transcript: When I think of a family, when I think of my future, I see Annie in the center of that. You know, and if that can't happen here, I'll go somewhere else.

segments.text: When I think of a family, when I think of my future, I see Annie in the center of that.
You know, and if that can't happen here, I'll go somewhere else.
